mapper.sql: id, name, platform, is_active, company_id, ebay_api_key_id, HardExpirationTime, ebay_site_code, wish_token, last_listing_sync_time_utc, ga_email, ga_account, ga_track_id, create_time_utc, create_user_id, update_time_utc, update_user_id

mapper.update:
update lt_store
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ebay_api_key_id = #{ebayApiKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HardExpirationTime = #{hardexpirationtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ebay_site_code = #{ebaySiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wish_token = #{wishToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_listing_sync_time_utc = #{lastListingSyncTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ga_email = #{gaEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ga_account = #{gaAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ga_track_id = #{gaTrackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ebay_token = #{ebayToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lt_store set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_api_key_id = #{ebayApiKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HardExpirationTime = #{hardexpirationtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_site_code = #{ebaySiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wish_token = #{wishToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_listing_sync_time_utc = #{lastListingSyncTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ga_email = #{gaEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ga_account = #{gaAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ga_track_id = #{gaTrackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_token = #{ebayToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lt_store set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_api_key_id = #{ebayApiKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HardExpirationTime = #{hardexpirationtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_site_code = #{ebaySiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wish_token = #{wishToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_listing_sync_time_utc = #{lastListingSyncTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ga_email = #{gaEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ga_account = #{gaAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ga_track_id = #{gaTrackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.ebay_token,b.api_url,b.dev_id,b.app_id,b.cert_id,b.runame from lt_store a inner join lt_ebay_api_key b on a.ebay_api_key_id=b.id where a.company_id=#{companyId} and a.id=#{storeId}
select distinct platform from lt_store where is_active = 1 and ebay_api_key_id is not null and company_id = #{companyId}
select t1.id, t1.ebay_token, t1.is_active, t2.app_id, t2.cert_id, t2.dev_id from lt_store t1, lt_ebay_api_key t2 where t1.ebay_api_key_id = t2.id and t1.id = #{id}
